actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A concurrent resolution prohibiting use of Federal funds for foreign travel by Senators, Representatives, and officers and employees of the Congress, unless such travel is specifically authorized by a recorded three-fourths vote of the House involved.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of Federal funds for foreign travel expenses of Senators, Representatives, congressional officers or employees, unless such expenses are authorized by a recorded three-fourths vote of the appropriate House.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution prohibiting use of Federal funds for foreign travel by Senators, Representatives, and officers and employees of the Congress, unless such travel is specifically authorized by a recorded three-fourths vote of the House involved.
